p: All quantitative PCR (qPCR) reactions ware done with LightCycler ® EvoScript RNA SYBR ® Green I Master kit (Roche, Penzberg, Germany) in LightCycler ® 480 thermal cycler (Roche) in total volume of 20 μL per reaction on 96 (Roche, Penzberg, Germany). Reactions were managed with automatic pipetting station epMotion 5070 (Eppendorf, Hamburg, Germany).
